ðŸ“– Summary: Omnara is a platform that provides a unified interface to interact with AI agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI from various devices (terminal, web, and mobile). It allows users to monitor agent activity in real-time and respond to agent requests from a central dashboard, enhancing collaboration with AI agents.
